name: df-hmo
body: |- wceq(chmo, cmpt(s0, cnv, crab(s1, cdm(co(cv(s0), caj, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(co(cv(s0), caj, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ HmOp =(s0 ∈ NrmCVec ↦ { s1 ∈ dom((s0[adj]s0))|((s0[adj]s0)` s1)= s1 })
comment: Define the set of Hermitian (self-adjoint) operators on a normed complex vector space (normally a Hilbert space). Although we define it for any normed vector space for convenience, the definition is meaningful only for inner product spaces. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
